effect.en: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.
effect.fr: Lancez 2 pièces. Cette attaque inflige 20 dégâts plus 20 dégâts supplémentaires pour chaque côté face.

description.en: It twists and squirms through the ground. The thunderous roar of its tunneling echoes a long way.
